competitors.name: Google

competitors.name: Salesforce

competitors.name: Netflix
competitors.notes: New competitor in 2020 filing in gaming/entertainment

context: Revenue $153.3B. Netflix, Hulu, Tencent added as gaming/entertainment competitors. Pandemic accelerated cloud and collaboration tools competition.
